==== BIO ====

Software developer since the mid 80s. Into astronomy, open source, theatre, silent film,
historical war gaming in a variety of scales (28mm, 25mm, 15mm, 6mm...), civil war, napoleonic and war of 1812 reenacting, sci fi, as well as lots more. I go by tgall_foo or Dr_Who on freenode and oftc.
